thought: To craft a netherite_block, I need to place 9 netherite_ingots in a 3x3 square on the crafting grid. There are 9 netherite_ingots available in slot 24. I will start by moving one ingot to slot 1 on the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 1 with quantity 1
